title: Hinduja arm asks NCLT to junk BHEL insolvency plea
description: Hinduja National Power Corporation Ltd (HNPCL) has requested the dismissal of an insolvency petition filed by public sector undertaking Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd (BHEL) due to the PSU's failure to complete the project as per the contract.
